<ce:section-title>Syntheses of complexes</ce:section-title><ce:section-title>Cd(H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>pimda)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O)<ce:inf loc="post">2·</ce:inf>(H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O)<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf> (<ce:bold>1</ce:bold>) and [Zn(H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>pimda)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>]·3.5H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (<ce:bold>2</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0015" view="all">A mixture of H<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>pimda (198<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 0.1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), 3,3′,4,4′-biphenyltetracarboxylic acid (33.0<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 0.1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) and Cd(NO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>
<ce:bold>·</ce:bold>4H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (61.6<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 0.2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) were dissolve in H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (5<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL), and stirred for half an hour, then heated in a sealed vial at 75<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C for 3<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>days. Colorless block crystals of <ce:bold>1</ce:bold> were obtained. Yield: 23.67<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg (77%). The products were washed with distilled water and dried in air. <ce:italic>Anal</ce:italic>. Calc. for <ce:bold>1</ce:bold>: C, 31.25; H, 4.89; N, 9.12. Found: C, 31.65; H, 4.83; N, 9.45%. <ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>) ppm. ESI-MS: <ce:italic>m</ce:italic>/<ce:italic>z</ce:italic>

<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>) ppm. (It is a Zn monomer consisting of two crystallographically independent molecules in the asymmetric unit.)</ce:para><ce:section-title>[Cd<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(Hpimda)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(DMF)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>]<ce:italic>

Colorless block crystals of <ce:bold>3</ce:bold> were obtained. Yield: 56.64<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg (74%). The products were washed by distilled water and dried in air. <ce:italic>Anal</ce:italic>. Calc. for <ce:bold>3</ce:bold>: C, 34.61; N, 11.01; H, 3.93. Found: C, 34.92; N, 11.35; H, 3.99%. <ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>=<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>13.71 (s, 1H, N–<ce:italic>H</ce:italic>), 4.35 (t, <ce:italic>J</ce:italic>

clean_text:
Syntheses of complexes

Cd(H2pimda)2(H2O)2⋅(H2O)4 (1) and [Zn(H2pimda)2(H2O)2]⋅3.5H2O (2)

A mixture of H3pimda (198mg, 0.1mmol), 3,3',4,4'-biphenyltetracarboxylic acid (33.0mg, 0.1mmol) and Cd(NO3)2 ⋅4H2O (61.6mg, 0.2mmol) were dissolve in H2O (5mL), and stirred for half an hour, then heated in a sealed vial at 75°C for 3days. Colorless block crystals of 1 were obtained. Yield: 23.67mg (77%). The products were washed with distilled water and dried in air. Anal. Calc. for 1: C, 31.25; H, 4.89; N, 9.12. Found: C, 31.65; H, 4.83; N, 9.45%. IR (KBr pellet, cm-1): 3433 (s), 2968 (m), 1712 (s), 1534 (vs), 1472 (m), 1391 (s), 1267 (m), 1052 (w), 776(m). 1H NMR (400MHz, DMSO): δ =13.73 (s, 1H, N-H), 4.35 (t, J =5.0Hz, 2H, -CH 2CH2CH3), 3.44 (m, J =5.2Hz, 2H, -CH2CH 2CH3), 1.06 (t, J =7.0Hz, 3H, -CH2CH2CH 3) ppm. ESI-MS: m/z =615.0 [M]-, 614.0 [M-H]-, 569.9 [M-COOH]-.

A procedure similar to 1 was followed to prepare 2 except Cd(NO3)2 ⋅4H2O (61.6mg, 0.2mmol) was replaced by Zn(AcO)2 (43.9mg, 0.2mmol). Colorless block crystals of 2 were obtained. Yield: 19.97mg (72%). The products were washed by distilled water and dried in air. Anal. Calc. for 2: C, 34.61; H, 5.23; N, 10.09. Found: C, 34.25; H, 5.09; N, 9.92%. IR (KBr pellet, cm-1): 3425 (s), 3169 (s), 2967 (m), 1713 (s), 1538 (vs), 1462 (m), 1400 (s), 1277 (m), 774 (w). 1H NMR (400MHz, DMSO): δ =13.70 (s, 1H, N-H), 2.54 (br s, 2H, -CH 2CH2CH3), 1.46 (br s, 2H, -CH2CH 2CH3), 0.71 (t, J =4.0Hz, 3H, -CH2CH2CH 3) ppm. ESI-MS: m/z 910.8 [2M-H-11H2O]-, 733.9 [2M-11H2O-2CO2.-2COOH]-, 457.0 [M-5.5H2O]-, 413.0 [M-CO2]-. (It is a Zn monomer consisting of two crystallographically independent molecules in the asymmetric unit.)

[Cd2(Hpimda)2(DMF)2] n  (3)

Complex 3 was synthesized by heating a mixture of Cd(NO3)2⋅4H2O (61.6mg, 0.2mmol), H3pimda (198mg, 0.1mmol), benzidine (18.4mg, 0.1mmol), terephthalic acid (16.6mg, 0.1mmol) in mixed solutions of DMF (3mL) and H2O (3mL) at 75°C for 48h. Colorless block crystals of 3 were obtained. Yield: 56.64mg (74%). The products were washed by distilled water and dried in air. Anal. Calc. for 3: C, 34.61; N, 11.01; H, 3.93. Found: C, 34.92; N, 11.35; H, 3.99%. IR (KBr pellet, cm-1): 3435 (s), 2965 (m), 1658 (vs), 1571 (vs), 1474 (vs), 1383 (vs), 1269 (s), 1125 (s), 921 (m), 787 (w), 677 (w). 1H NMR (400MHz, DMSO): δ =13.71 (s, 1H, N-H), 4.35 (t, J =5.0Hz, 2H, -CH 2CH2CH3), 3.45 (m, J =5.6Hz, 2H, -CH2CH 2CH3), 1.05 (t, J =7.0Hz, 3H, -CH2CH2CH 3) ppm. ESI-MS: m/z =572.9 [M-2DMF-COOH]-.
